name: happy-thousandth-post-to-us
title: Happy Thousandth Post To Us!
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
We’re not sure whether we should be proud of this or ashamed that we spend so much time on the internet, but this post right here happens to be our thousandth post here at Nashvillest (and we’re still a few months short of our first birthday). Yikes! Not that we’re ones to get all sentimental on you, but when we dig back through the archives and realize that we’ve really, truly sat down and cranked out one thousand posts, we feel like it’s an occasion at least worth acknowledging. That’s a whole lot of news and views and freebies and photos and city quirks and Craigslist weirdness, you know? A huge thanks goes out to all of you, the readers, for giving us a reason to keep this up.

No related posts.
